title: So  now its 2 bot, 1 mid, and 2 top?
body: Cant wait to see those kinds of comps

replies.body: No no no. Itâ€™s 3 top, mid cleans a wave, 4 bot. :D just perma ganking top and bot.
No, it's 1 top, 1 mid, 2 bot, with a jungler that alternates between farming and ganking instead of powerfarming for 30 minutes without interacting with the enemy and coming out fed.
